m2mimud.state
Interface MerchantListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSystem
public interface MerchantListener

This interface is used by any objects who are informed about the broadcast from a merchant.

Method Summary
 void sendMessage(int merchantType, XYloc merchantLocation)
          Causes the listener to display the merchant's broadcast message
 

Method Detail

sendMessage

void sendMessage(int merchantType,
                 XYloc merchantLocation)
Causes the listener to display the merchant's broadcast message

Parameters:
merchantType - The type of merchant that is broadcasting
merchantLocation - The location of the merchant
